backend/main.mo: Defines the core backend actor with user data models, task/list/routine types, monetary settings, and access-control state.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of key frontend files describing components, hooks, layouts, and behaviors.
frontend/docs/task-toggle-audit.md: Explains latency issues in task completion toggles and identifies causes such as synchronous waits and full refetches.
frontend/index.css: Defines global CSS variables and light/dark theme styles using Tailwind layers.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document configuring PWA metadata, icons, manifest, and root mounting element.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, colors, icons, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, activation cleanup, and network‑first fetch handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component providing theme context and rendering TaskManager, toasts, and offline indicator.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin UI for searching, viewing, promoting, and demoting users with pagination support.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapLoa: Full‑screen loading indicator shown during authentication bootstrap.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Bottom navigation component with plan‑mode switching, long‑press detection, and action menu controls.
frontend/src/components/CreateListDialog: Dialog component for creating a new list with a name input and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/CustomLists.tsx: Renders and manages custom task lists with drag-and-drop, creation, deletion, and task interactions.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing task details including title, description, list, and properties.
frontend/src/components/EisenhowerMatrix: Displays Eisenhower Matrix quadrants with drag-and-drop task management and expand/collapse behavior.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, date display, auth controls, theme toggle, and admin access.
frontend/src/components/InsightsDialog.t: Analytics dialog showing spend insights with charts and time filters.
frontend/src/components/MorningRoutine.t: Renders and manages morning/evening routine lists with adding, deleting, completing, drag-and-drop reordering, and display modes.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Displays a full-screen offline notice when the browser loses network connectivity.
frontend/src/components/PayrollHistoryDi: Shows payroll history with editing, submitting entries, and formatted date display inside a dialog.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Provides a settings dialog to configure monetary limits and toggle earnings with validation and dynamic recalculation.
Handles creating, deleting, and confirming spend entries and presets within a scrollable dialog.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Represents a draggable and touch-friendly task card with edit, delete, and complete actions.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A button that switches between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/TodayEarnsDialog: Displays daily earnings calculations from tasks and routines and allows submitting payroll with history view support.
frontend/src/components/UnauthenticatedS: Shows a branded login screen prompting users to sign in with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/UniversalAddTask: Provides a dialog to create tasks in quadrants or custom lists with inputs for task metadata.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Collects a user's name to create an initial profile with default settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook handling login, stored identity restoration, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profile, admin actions, app mode, and various data entities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables plus animations for themes and streak effects.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines local React-friendly task and list types and helpers to convert to and from backend types.
frontend/src/lib/userTier.ts: Maps backend UserTier enum values to human-readable labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing QueryClient and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/TaskManager.tsx: Main task manager page orchestrating authentication, profile loading, tasks, routines, settings, and various UI dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/dragPayload.ts: Provides helpers to write and read stable drag-and-drop payloads with fallback MIME types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins with custom OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s versioned state plus a comprehensive list of implemented features covering authentication, actor initialization, secret handling, RBAC, and admin tools. Each feature entry includes IDs, descriptions, synonyms, and version metadata for planning and tracking.
